name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high-speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its tender body.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself.

name: Beedrill
description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Very protective of its sprawling territory, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at intruders.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey.

name: Rattata
description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: Raticate
description: Its hind feet are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers. It uses its whiskers to maintain balance.

name: Spearow
description: Inept at flying high, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow.

name: Arbok
description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
description: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Sandslash
description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
description: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it attacks with a poisonous horn.

name: Nidorino
description: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: Nidoking
description: It uses its thick tail to smash into its opponents. It is strong enough to topple a metal tower.

name: Clefairy
description: Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: Ninetales
description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can inflate itself seemingly without end.

name: Zubat
description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Golbat
description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: Gloom
description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: Vileplume
description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
description: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to control it.

name: Venonat
description: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of tiny eyes.

name: Venomoth
description: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove. They also contain poison that weakens prey.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
description: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
description: Adores circular objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle temperament.

name: Psyduck
description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

name: Golduck
description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster Kappa.

name: Mankey
description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: Growlithe
description: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: Arcanine
description: A legendary Pokémon in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

name: Poliwag
description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming over trying to stand.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

name: Kadabra
description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.

name: Alakazam
description: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ is said to be around 5,000.

name: Machop
description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become stronger.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful that it must wear a power-save belt to regulate its strength.

name: Machamp
description: Using its four arms, it can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

name: Bellsprout
description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
description: It spits out poison powder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of acid.

name: Victreebel
description: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day.

name: Tentacool
description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: Tentacruel
description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
description: Rolls down slopes to move. It can travel faster by rolling than by walking.

name: Golem
description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: Ponyta
description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: Rapidash
description: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: Slowbro
description: The Shellder that is latched onto Slowpoke’s tail is said to feed on the host’s leftover scraps.

name: Magnemite
description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves.

name: Magneton
description: Formed by several Magnemite linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Farfetch’d
description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

name: Doduo
description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast running. Leaves giant footprints.

name: Dodrio
description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: Seel
description: Loves freezing cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14°F.

name: Dewgong
description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: Grimer
description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: Shellder
description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
description: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It shoots spikes from the shell using water pressure.

name: Gastly
description: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Haunter
description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: Gengar
description: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: Onix
description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to black-colored diamonds.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: Hypno
description: Carries a pendulum-like device. It stares at the opponent to lull it into a deep state of hypnosis.

name: Krabby
description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

name: Kingler
description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: Voltorb
description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

name: Electrode
description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: Exeggcute
description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: Exeggutor
description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue to live as an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: Marowak
description: The bone it holds is its primary weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to attack.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Known for its powerful legs, it can extend them to launch devastating kicks from a distance.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Specializes in punches. Its arm speed allows it to throw a flurry of punches too fast to see.

name: Lickitung
description: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It uses it to lick its enemies, causing a tingling paralysis.

name: Koffing
description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps to feed on the filth.

name: Weezing
description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two Koffing can fuse into a Weezing over many years.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Its massive bones are 1,000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock over a trailer.

name: Rhydon
description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600°F.

name: Chansey
description: A gentle and kind-hearted Pokémon that shares its nutritious eggs with injured people and Pokémon.

name: Tangela
description: Its body is cloaked in blue vines, which are always growing. The vines shroud its identity.

name: Kangaskhan
description: Raises its young in its belly pouch. It will fiercely protect its baby from any threat.

name: Horsea
description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
description: The poisonous barbs all over its body are highly valued as ingredients for herbal medicine.

name: Goldeen
description: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

name: Seaking
description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: Staryu
description: If its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the central core remains intact.

name: Starmie
description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. It is said to be connected to the stars.

name: Mr. Mime
description: If interrupted while miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

name: Scyther
description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one of itself.

name: Jynx
description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance uncontrollably.

name: Electabuzz
description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
description: Its body always burns with an orange glow. It spews scorching flames from its mouth.

name: Pinsir
description: Grips its prey in its pincers until the prey is torn in half. It can lift things twice its weight.

name: Tauros
description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: Magikarp
description: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers, and shallow puddles.

name: Gyarados
description: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: Lapras
description: A gentle soul that can understand human speech. It ferries people across bodies of water.

name: Ditto
description: Capable of copying an enemy’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the target.

name: Eevee
description: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways depending on the environment.

name: Vaporeon
description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin that is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

name: Jolteon
description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

name: Flareon
description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature can soar to over 1,600°F.

name: Porygon
description: The only Pokémon that people anticipate can fly into space. It was created entirely by programming code.

name: Omanyte
description: Although long extinct, in rare cases it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

name: Omastar
description: Its heavy shell is thought to be the reason this ancient Pokémon died out. It could not catch prey.

name: Kabuto
description: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor.

name: Kabutops
description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A ferocious prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy’s throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: Snorlax
description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
description: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to bring early spring to the wintry lands it visits.

name: Dratini
description: Long considered a mythical Pokémon until recently, when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: Dragonair
description: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.

name: Dragonite
description: An extremely rare, highly intelligent Pokémon that can fly around the globe in just 16 hours.

name: Mewtwo
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

name: Mew
description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
